levels.name: A/D Briar F Save
levels.effect:
If foe with Range = 2 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If foe's Range = 2, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 5 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and unit's next attack deals damage = 40% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: A/D Briar N Save
levels.effect:
If foe with Range = 1 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If foe's Range = 1, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 5 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and unit's next attack deals damage = 40% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: A/D Briar P Save
levels.effect:
If sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast foe initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If foe uses sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast damage, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit, disables foe's effects that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" (including area-of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 5 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and unit's next attack deals damage = 40% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: A/D Cantrip 3
levels.effect:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk/Def-7 and【Sabotage】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Sabotage】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest penalty on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit through its next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

levels.name: A/D Far Save 1
levels.effect:
If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+1 during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: A/D Far Save 2
levels.effect:
If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: A/D Far Trace 1
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (Rem.)】.

Inflicts Atk/Def-1 on foe during combat.

【Canto (Rem.)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = any movement not already used that turn. (If unit used a movement skill that warped them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

levels.name: A/D Spiked Wall
levels.effect:
Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

Foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe, deals damage = 15% of the greater of unit's Def or Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's first attack by 7 ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: A/D Twin F Save
levels.effect:
If foe with Range = 2 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers 【Savior】on unit.

If foe's Range = 2, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat, any "reduces damage by X%" effect that can be triggered only once per combat by unit's equipped Special skill can be triggered up to twice per combat (excludes boosted Special effects from engaging; only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit when unit deals damage to foe during combat (triggers even if 0 damage is dealt).

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: A/R Far Resound
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (Rem.; Min １)】.

Deals damage to unit as combat begins = 20% of X (X = unit's max HP before entering battle - 20; "max HP before entering battle" means unit's max HP excluding HP increases from Legendary Effects, Mythic Effects, Bonus Heroes, etc.; activates only when unit can attack in combat; effects that reduce damage "during combat" do not apply; will not reduce unit's HP below 1).

Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe, unit deals damage = unit's HP at start of combat - current HP, × 2 (max 12, min 6; excluding area-of-effect Specials) and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by percentage = unit's HP at start of combat - current HP, × 10 during combat (max 60%, min 30%; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Canto (Rem.; Min １)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = any movement not already used that turn (min. １; if unit used a movement skill that warped them, unit can move １ space(s)).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. levels.name: A/R Incite Hone
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+6 and【Incited】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn.

Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Res during combat = number of allies on the map with the【Incited】 effect + 2 (excluding unit; max 5).

【Incited】
If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of spaces from start position to end position of unit during combat (max 3; that turn only).

After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = any movement not already used that turn. (If unit used a movement skill that warped them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

Unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of any ally within 2 spaces.

levels.effect:

Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = number of allies on the map with the【Incited】 effect + 2 (excluding unit; max 5).

【Incited】
If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of spaces from start position to end position of unit during combat (max 3; that turn only).

levels.name: A/S Outcry Dull
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 and "neutralizes foe's bonuses during combat" to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn.

Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd = number of allies on the map with the "neutralizes foe's bonuses during combat" status effect active + 2 (excluding unit; max 5) and deals damage = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat × 2 during combat (max 8; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: A/S Rein Snap
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces of unit during combat. At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an armored ally or an infantry ally with Range = 1, grants "unit can move 1 extra space" to unit, to infantry allies with Range = 1 within 2 spaces of unit, and to armored allies within 2 spaces of unit. (That turn only; does not stack; effect triggers only if unit has no Sing or Dance skill.)

levels.name: A/S Spiked Wall
levels.effect:
Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

Foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe, deals damage = 15% of unit's Spd (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's first attack by 7 ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Absolute Closure
levels.effect:
At start of turn, inflicts【Undefended】and 【Feud】on foes within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit through their next actions. At start of turn, if any foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, grants【Dodge】to unit and neutralizes any【Penalty】 (excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn). If unit transforms, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

【Undefended】
Unit cannot be protected by Savior through their next action.

【Feud】
Disables all ally skills (excluding unit's) during combat through unit's next action.

【Dodge】
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: According to Plan
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+6 and【Canto (１)】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn and inflicts【Hush Spectrum】and【Panic】on closest foes and any foe within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Spd/Res-5 on foe, unit deals +X × 5 damage (max 25; excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from foe's first attack by X × 3 (max 15) during combat (X = number of Bonus effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses + number of Penalty effects active on foe, excluding stat penalties; "first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes).

【Canto (１)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s).
(Once per turn. Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

【Hush Spectrum】
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on unit during combat. If unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on unit before unit's first attack during combat (cannot exceed the unit's maximum Special cooldown). If unit's maximum Special cooldown count is reduced (Special trigger is accelerated) and if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1 to foe before unit's first attack during combat.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

levels.name: Active Lookout
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (２)】.

When Canto triggers, enables unit to use 【Distant Swap】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit during combat.

If unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe's next attack.

【Canto (２)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

【Distant Swap】
Range = 2. Unit and target ally swap spaces.

levels.name: Aerial Maneuvers
levels.effect: Unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of any ally within 2 spaces. At start of combat, if both unit's and foe's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat, and also, if unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack during combat.

levels.name: Aerobatics 1
levels.effect: If unit's HP = 100%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

levels.name: Aerobatics 2

levels.name: Aerobatics 3

levels.name: Air Orders 1

levels.name: Air Orders 2

levels.name: Air Orders 3

levels.name: Already Dead
levels.effect:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+9.

At start of player phase or enemy phase, if unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants【Anathema】and【Charge】to unit and allies within 3 spaces of unit for 1 turn.

Inflicts Spd/Def/Res-4 on foes within 3 spaces of unit during combat.

Unit can move up to 3 spaces in any cardinal direction. (Cannot move through foes, terrain that blocks movement, or effects of skills like Obstruct. Granted movement treated as Warp movement.)

levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+2 during combat.

levels.name: Armored Blow 2
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat.

levels.name: Armored Blow 3
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.

levels.name: Armored Boots
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100%, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Armored Stride 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% and unit is not adjacent to an ally, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Armored Stride 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit is not adjacent to an ally, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Armored Stride 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally, unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Armored Wall
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

During unit's first combat in player phase or enemy phase, at start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25% while transformed, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40%.

levels.name: Ashera's Chosen
levels.effect: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. If unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, grants Atk/Def+6 during combat.

levels.name: Ashera's Chosen+
levels.effect: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. If unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies, if unit is not adjacent to any ally, or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Def/Res+9 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Res > foe's Res, deals damage = 70% of the difference between stats (max 7) and reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

levels.name: Assassin's Strike
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe as combat begins (effects that reduce damage during combat do not apply; will not reduce foe's HP below 1), inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat, and deals damage = 20% of foe's Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Assault Fighter
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat or is within 3 spaces of an ally, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe, deals damage = 20% of unit's Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's attacks by 20% of unit's Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Assault Force
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe, neutralizes penalties on unit, deals damage = 20% of the greater of unit's Spd or Def (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Assault Rush
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% or any foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, grants Atk+6, "unit can move 1 extra space (that turn only, does not stack)," and【Charge】 to unit for 1 turn.

If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+5 to unit and grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before unit's first attack during combat.

【Charge】
Unit can move up to 3 spaces in any cardinal direction. (Cannot move through foes, terrain that blocks movement, or effects of skills like Obstruct. Granted movement treated as Warp movement.)

levels.name: Assault Troop 1
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if any foe is in cardinal directions of unit, grants【Charge】to unit for 1 turn.

【Charge】
Unit can move up to 3 spaces in any cardinal direction. (Cannot move through foes, terrain that blocks movement, or effects of skills like Obstruct. Granted movement treated as Warp movement.)

levels.name: Assault Troop 2
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if any foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, grants【Charge】to unit for 1 turn.

【Charge】
Unit can move up to 3 spaces in any cardinal direction. (Cannot move through foes, terrain that blocks movement, or effects of skills like Obstruct. Granted movement treated as Warp movement.)

levels.name: Assault Troop 3
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% or any foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, grants【Charge】to unit for 1 turn.

【Charge】
Unit can move up to 3 spaces in any cardinal direction. (Cannot move through foes, terrain that blocks movement, or effects of skills like Obstruct. Granted movement treated as Warp movement.)

levels.name: Assured Rebirth
levels.effect: If unit's Res > foe's Res, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. Reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = number of staff or dragon allies within 3 spaces of unit × 20, and also, if unit's Res > foe's Res, difference between stats × 4 (max 40%; total max 60%).

levels.name: Atk Cantrip 1
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-3 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk Cantrip 2
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-5 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk Cantrip 3
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-7 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk/Def Bond 1
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+3 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Bond 2
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Bond 3
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Bond 4
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Bulwark 1
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foe during combat. Restores 3 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Bulwark 2
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe during combat. Restores 5 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Bulwark 3
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: A/D Bulwark 4
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills). Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes). Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Catch 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Def+3 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Def Catch 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Def Catch 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Def Catch 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Def+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on foe, grants an additional Atk/Def+2 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Def Clash 1
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def during combat = X + 1. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 1.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Clash 2
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def during combat = X + 3. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 2.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Clash 3
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def during combat = X + 5. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 3.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Clash 4
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def during combat = X + 6. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 4.) If X ≥ 2, neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Discord
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Atk/Def-6 and【Discord】on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions.

Inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat = number of foes inflicted with【Discord】 within 2 spaces of target, including target, × 2, + 4 (max 10) and deals damage = 15% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Discord】
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-X on unit during combat (X = 2 + number of allies within 2 spaces of unit; max 5) through its next action.

levels.name: Atk/Def Excel
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants Atk/Def+6 and Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 4), and also, if unit initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's attacks by X × 3 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials). If foe's attack triggers foe's Special, reduces damage dealt to unit by X × 3 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Atk/Def Finish 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+2 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +1 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Finish 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +3 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Finish 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+6 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Finish 4
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials), and when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Form 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

levels.name: Atk/Def Form 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

levels.name: Atk/Def Form 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

levels.name: Atk/Def Fortune
levels.effect:
If unit can transform, transformation effects gain "if unit is within 2 spaces of a beast or dragon ally, or if number of adjacent allies other than beast or dragon allies ≤ 2" as a trigger condition (in addition to existing conditions).

If defending in Aether Raids, at the start of enemy turn 1, if conditions for transforming are met, unit transforms.

If unit is transformed or if foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+8 to unit and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def during combat, and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Gap 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+1 to ally with the highest Atk+Def total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Gap 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+3 to ally with the highest Atk+Def total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Gap 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+5 to ally with the highest Atk+Def total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Hold
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foes within 3 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Ideal 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+3 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Def Ideal 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Def Ideal 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Def Ideal 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and【Bonus】is active on unit, grants an additional Atk/Def+2 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Def Link 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Def Link 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Def Link 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Def Menace
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on nearest foes through their next actions and grants Atk/Def+6 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Def Oath 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+3 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Def Oath 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Def Oath 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Def Oath 4
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+6 and the following status to unit for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces." If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+3 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Prime 1
levels.effect:
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of【Bonus】effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, × 2, + 1; max 3).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Def Prime 2
levels.effect:
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of【Bonus】effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, × 2, + 1; max 5).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Def Prime 3
levels.effect:
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of【Bonus】effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, × 2, + 3; max 7).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Def Prime 4
levels.effect:
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of【Bonus】effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, × 2, + 3; max 9), and also, if number of【Bonus】effects active on unit (excluding stat bonuses) ≥ 4, unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Def Push 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Push 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Push 3
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Def+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Push 4
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Def+7, but if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Rein 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Rein 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Rein 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Ruse 1
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Ruse 2
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Ruse 3
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Atk/Def Scowl 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Def+2 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+15 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack (cannot exceed foe's maximum Special cooldown).

levels.name: Atk/Def Scowl 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+12 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack (cannot exceed foe's maximum Special cooldown).

levels.name: Atk/Def Scowl 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Def+6 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+9 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack (cannot exceed foe's maximum Special cooldown).

levels.name: Atk/Def Scowl 4
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Def+7 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+5 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack (cannot exceed foe's maximum Special cooldown).

levels.name: Atk/Def Snag 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk/Def Snag 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk/Def Snag 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk/Def Snag 4
levels.effect:
Inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat. If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Def-7 and【Sabotage】on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target ally after movement and on foes within 2 spaces of those foes equipped with a skill that can trigger the Savior effect through their next actions.

【Sabotage】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest penalty on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit through its next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

levels.name: Atk/Def Solo 1
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+2 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Solo 2
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Solo 3
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+6 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Solo 4
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Def+7 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Def Unity
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5 and bonus to Atk/Def during combat = current penalty on each of those stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Atk, grants Atk+19, for a net bonus of Atk+12.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.

levels.name: Atk/Def Wild
levels.effect: If number of adjacent allies other than beast or dragon allies ≤ 1, or if unit is transformed, grants Atk/Def+7 to unit during combat and grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk Feint 1
levels.effect: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk Feint 2
levels.effect: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk Feint 3
levels.effect: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk Oath Echo
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk+6 and "unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces" to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk Opening 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+2 to ally with the highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk Opening 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+4 to ally with the highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk Opening 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+6 to ally with the highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk Ploy 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk Ploy 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk Ploy 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk/Res Bond 1
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+3 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Bond 2
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Bond 3
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+5 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Bond 4
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Res during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Catch 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Res+3 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Res Catch 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Res Catch 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Res Catch 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on foe, grants an additional Atk/Res+2 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Res Crux
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit, and those foes suffer guaranteed follow-up attacks during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Detect
levels.effect:
Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe during combat.

If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts【Exposure】on closest foes within 5 spaces of both unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally after movement and foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions.

Inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foes on the map with the 【Exposure】effect active and neutralizes bonuses to Atk/Res for those foes during combat.

【Exposure】
Foe's attacks deal +10 damage.

levels.name: Atk/Res Discord
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Atk/Res-6 and【Discord】on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions.

Inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Res during combat = number of foes inflicted with【Discord】 within 2 spaces of target, including target, × 2, + 4 (max 10) and deals damage = 15% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Discord】
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-X on unit during combat (X = 2 + number of allies within 2 spaces of unit; max 5) through its next action.

levels.name: Atk/Res Finish 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+2 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +1 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Finish 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +3 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Finish 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Finish 4
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials), and when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Form 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

levels.name: Atk/Res Form 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

levels.name: Atk/Res Form 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+X to unit during combat (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

levels.name: Atk/Res Fortune
levels.effect:
If unit can transform, transformation effects gain "if unit is within 2 spaces of a beast or dragon ally, or if number of adjacent allies other than beast or dragon allies ≤ 2" as a trigger condition (in addition to existing conditions).

If defending in Aether Raids, at the start of enemy turn 1, if conditions for transforming are met, unit transforms.

If unit is transformed or if foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+8 to unit and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def during combat, and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Gap 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk/Res+1 to ally with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Gap 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk/Res+3 to ally with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Gap 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk/Res+5 to ally with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Havoc
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Atk/Res-7,【Sabotage】, and【Schism】 on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions.

After start-of-turn skills trigger on unit's player phase, if the number of foes with the 【Sabotage】effect active on the map ≥ 2, grants 【Canto (１)】to unit for 1 turn.

Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe and deals damage = 20% of unit's Res during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Sabotage】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest penalty on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit through its next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

【Schism】
Neutralizes Triangle Attack, Dual Strike, and Pathfinder effects active on unit through unit's next action. Unit is excluded from ally Triangle Attack and Dual Strike effects calculated using numbers of allies. When this status (Schism) is neutralized, Triangle Attack, Dual Strike, and Pathfinder effects are also neutralized.

【Canto (１)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s).
(Once per turn. Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Hold
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes within 3 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Ideal 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+3 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Res Ideal 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Res Ideal 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Res Ideal 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and【Bonus】is active on unit, grants an additional Atk/Res+2 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Atk/Res Link 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Res Link 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Res Link 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Res Mastery
levels.effect:
If unit has entered combat during the current turn, enables【Canto (２)】.

At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if any space within 2 spaces of unit has a Divine Vein effect applied or counts as difficult terrain, excluding impassable terrain, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat.

【Canto (２)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Menace
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on nearest foes through their next actions and grants Atk/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Res Oath 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+3 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Res Oath 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Res Oath 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Res Oath 4
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+6 and the following status to unit for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces." If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+3 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Ploy 3
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts Atk/Res-7,【Ploy】, and【Exposure】 on those foes through their next actions.

【Ploy】
Neutralizes【Bonus Doubler】,【Treachery】, and【Grand Strategy】effects active on unit during combat through unit's next action.

【Exposure】
Foe's attacks deal +10 damage.

【Bonus Doubler】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

【Treachery】
Unit deals additional damage = total bonuses on unit for 1 turn.

【Grand Strategy】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current penalty on each of unit's stats × 2 for 1 turn. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Atk, grants Atk+14, for a net bonus of Atk+7.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.

Unit's negative effects that last "through unit's next action" will remain in effect until this status (Grand Strategy) is neutralized.

levels.name: Atk/Res Push 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Push 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Push 3
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Res+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Push 4
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Res+7, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

levels.name: Atk/Res Rein 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-2 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Rein 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Rein 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Ruse 1
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Ruse 2
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Ruse 3
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Scowl 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Res+2 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+15 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Scowl 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+12 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Scowl 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+9 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Scowl 4
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+5 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Atk/Res Snag 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk/Res Snag 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk/Res Snag 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Atk/Res Solo 1
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+2 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Solo 2
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Solo 3
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Solo 4
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Res+7 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Tempo 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Tempo 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Tempo 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Tempo 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe, neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduces damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (example: a foe with a "reduces damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead).

levels.name: Atk/Res Tidings
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat or is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Res = number of allies within 3 spaces of unit × 2, + 8 (max 12), and foe cannot counterattack during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Res Unity
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+5 and bonus to Atk/Res during combat=current penalty on each of those stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Atk, grants Atk+19, for a net bonus of Atk+12.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.

levels.name: Atk Smoke 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Atk Smoke 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Atk Smoke 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Atk Smoke 4
levels.effect: After combat, inflicts Atk-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions, grants Def/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn, and unit gains "foe cannot make a follow-up attack" for 1 turn.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Aria
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat or is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd = unit's maximum Special cooldown count + 7 during combat, and also, when unit's Special triggers, deals damage = unit's maximum Special cooldown count × X (excluding area-of-effect Specials; if unit triggers the "unit attacks twice" effect, X = 3; otherwise, X = 5).

levels.name: Atk/Spd Bond 1
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+3 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Bond 2
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Bond 3
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Bond 4
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Bulwark 1
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foe during combat. Restores 3 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Bulwark 2
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe during combat. Restores 5 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Bulwark 3
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: A/S Bulwark 4
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills). Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes). Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Catch 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+3 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.effect:

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Spd Catch 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Spd Catch 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on foe, grants an additional Atk/Spd+2 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Atk/Spd Clash 1
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = X + 1. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 1.)

levels.name: Atk/Spd Clash 2
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = X + 3. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 2.)

levels.name: Atk/Spd Clash 3
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = X + 5. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 3.)

levels.name: Atk/Spd Clash 4
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd during combat = X + 6. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 4.) If X ≥ 2, neutralizes unit's penalties to Atk/Spd during combat.

levels.name: Atk/Spd Excel
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants Atk/Spd+6 and Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 4), and also, if unit initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's attacks by X × 3 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials). If foe's attack triggers foe's Special, reduces damage dealt to unit by X × 3 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Atk/Spd Faith
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 and【Bulwark】to unit for 1 turn.

If【Bulwark】is active on unit, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 5 ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's first attack during combat.

【Bulwark】
Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

Foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

levels.name: Atk/Spd Finish 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+2 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +1 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Atk/Spd Finish 4
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials), and when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

levels.name: Atk/Spd Form 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

levels.name: Atk/Spd Form 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

levels.name: Atk/Spd Form 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).
