levels.effect: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+3 during combat."

levels.name: Close Guard 3
levels.effect: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, grants Def/Res+4 during combat."

levels.name: Close Reversal
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+5 to unit during combat and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

levels.name: Close Salvo
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk+5 during combat, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

levels.name: Close Ward
levels.effect: If magic, staff, or dragonstone foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range, disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res," and grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Connected World
levels.effect:
If unit can transform, transformation effects gain "if unit is within 2 spaces of any allies from a different title than unit" as a trigger condition (in addition to existing conditions).

If defending in Aether Raids, at the start of enemy turn 1, if conditions for transforming are met, unit transforms.

At start of turn, and at start of enemy phase (except for in Summoner Duels), if unit is within 3 spaces of any allies from a different title than unit, grants Atk/Def+6,【Resonance: Blades】, 【Resonance: Shields】, and "reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special 'reduce damage by X%' skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials)" to unit and allies within 3 spaces of unit for 1 turn, and also, for unit and allies within 3 spaces of unit, if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants Special cooldown count-1.

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def/Res+5 to unit and reduces damage from foe's attacks by 40% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and also, if unit's Special cooldown count is at its maximum value after combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit after combat.

For allies within 3 spaces of unit, if Special cooldown count is at its maximum value after combat, grants Special cooldown count-1.

【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.

【Resonance: Shields】
Grants Def/Res+4 during combat and the following effect for 1 turn: "During unit's first combat in player phase or enemy phase, foe cannot make a follow-up attack."

levels.name: Corrupted Dragon
levels.effect:
After unit acts (if Canto triggers, after Canto), applies【Divine Vein (Stone)】to spaces within 5 rows and 5 columns centered on unit for 1 turn.

Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to allies within 5 rows and 5 columns centered on unit and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on those allies during combat.

If there is an ally within 5 rows and 5 columns centered on unit, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat, and also, when unit's Special triggers, neutralizes foe's "reduces damage by X%" effects from foe's non-Special skills (excluding when dealing damage with an area-of-effect Special).

【Divine Vein (Stone)】
Applies the following effects on space for unit and allies: Grants Def/Res+6 during combat, reduces damage from foe's Specials by 10 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from area-of-effect Specials by 50% (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out. Does not count as defensive terrain.)

levels.name: Counter Fighter
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Atk-5 on foe, deals damage = 15% of unit's Atk (excluding area- of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from foe's attacks by 15% of unit's Atk during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and restores 7 HP to unit when unit deals damage to foe during combat, and also, if unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-2 to unit before foe's first attack during combat.

levels.name: Counter Roar 1
levels.effect: Reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 10% and unit's next attack deals damage = 10% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

levels.name: Counter Roar 2
levels.effect: Reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 20% and unit's next attack deals damage = 20% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

levels.name: Counter Roar 3
levels.effect: Reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30% and unit's next attack deals damage = 30% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack).

levels.name: Counter Roar 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30% (for standard attacks, "first attack" means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and unit's next attack deals damage = 30% of foe's attack damage prior to reductions (resets at end of combat; only highest value applied; does not stack). Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Crafty Fighter 1
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Crafty Fighter 2
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Crafty Fighter 3
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Creation Pulse
levels.effect:
If【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+3 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-X to unit before unit's first attack during combat (X = number of 【Penalty】effects active on foe, excluding stat penalties; max 2).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Cross Spur Atk
levels.effect: Grants Atk+5 to allies in cardinal directions of unit during combat.

levels.name: Cross Spur Res
levels.effect: Grants Res+5 to allies in cardinal directions of unit during combat.

levels.name: Cross Spur Spd
levels.effect: Grants Spd+5 to allies in cardinal directions of unit during combat.

levels.name: Crusader's Ward
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe's Range = 2, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 80%. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

levels.name: Crux Echo
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-3 on foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit, and those foes suffer guaranteed follow-up attacks during combat.

levels.name: Crystalline Water
levels.effect:
Grants Atk/Res+8. Inflicts Def-8.

At start of player phase or enemy phase, neutralizes【Panic】and any penalties to unit's Atk/Res that take effect on unit at this time.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

levels.name: D Bonus Doubler
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = highest bonus on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit; calculates each stat bonus independently).

levels.name: D Counter Echo
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

levels.name: D/R Far Save 1
levels.effect:
If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+1 during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: D/R Far Save 2
levels.effect:
If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: D/R Far Save 3
levels.effect:
If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: D/R Near Save 1
levels.effect:
If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally adjacent to unit, triggers【Savior】on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+1 during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: D/R Near Save 2
levels.effect:
If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】
on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: D/R Near Save 3
levels.effect:
If a foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】
on unit.

If unit triggers Savior, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: D/R Twin N Save
levels.effect:
If foe with Range = 1 initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers 【Savior】on unit.

If foe's Range = 1, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat, any "reduces damage by X%" effect that can be triggered only once per combat by unit's equipped Special skill can be triggered up to twice per combat (excludes boosted Special effects from engaging; only highest value applied; does not stack), and restores 7 HP to unit when unit deals damage to foe during combat (triggers even if 0 damage is dealt).

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: Dagger Exp. 1
levels.effect: While unit lives and uses a dagger, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dagger Exp. 2
levels.effect: While unit lives, all dagger allies on team get 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dagger Exp. 3
levels.effect: While unit lives, all dagger allies on team get 2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dagger Valor 1
levels.effect:
While unit lives and uses a dagger, unit gets 1.5x SP.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dagger Valor 2
levels.effect:
While unit lives, all dagger allies on team get 1.5x SP.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dagger Valor 3
levels.effect:
While unit lives, all dagger allies on team get 2x SP.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Daggerbreaker 1
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

levels.name: Daggerbreaker 2
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

levels.name: Daggerbreaker 3
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

levels.name: Daring Fighter 1
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 40% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Daring Fighter 2
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 60% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Daring Fighter 3
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 80% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Dark Perfume
levels.effect:
At start of turn, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit, inflicts【Undefended】and status preventing counterattacks on closest foes through their next actions, and inflicts status preventing counterattacks on foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe, deals damage = 20% of unit's Spd (including when dealing damage with an area-of-effect Special), and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect; if unit ends movement on a space with a Hex Trap, reduces trap's trigger condition by 10 HP.

【Undefended】
Unit cannot be protected by Savior through their next action.

levels.name: Darkling Dragon
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+6 and【Warp Bubble】to unit for 1 turn. At start of turn, grants Def/Res+6 and【Warp Bubble】to any support partner within 2 spaces of unit or, if unit is not on a team with unit's support partner, to ally with the highest Def within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack), and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials). If a foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】on unit. If unit triggers Savior, grants Atk/Def/Res+4 during combat.

【Warp Bubble】
Foes cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains.)

【Savior】
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.

Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

levels.name: Darkling Guardian
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+6, "foe cannot make a follow-up attack," and【Warp Bubble】to unit for one turn.

【Warp Bubble】
Foes cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains.)

levels.name: Darkling Guard II
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (２)】.

At start of player phase or enemy phase, grants Def/Res+6, "foe cannot make a follow-up attack," "neutralizes 'effective against flying' bonuses,"【Warp Bubble】, and【Bulwark】to unit and target allies within 3 spaces of unit for 1 turn. (If support partner is on player team, targets any support partner; otherwise, targets ally with the highest Def on player team, excluding unit.)

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit, neutralizes penalties to unit's Atk, neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk, reduces damage from foe's attacks by 7 (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

【Canto (２)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).
(Once per turn. Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

【Warp Bubble】
Foes cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains.)

【Bulwark】
Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

Foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

levels.name: Darting Blow 1
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

levels.name: Darting Blow 2
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

levels.name: Darting Blow 3
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

levels.name: Darting Blow 4
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+9 during combat.

levels.name: Darting Breath
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Darting Stance 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

levels.name: Darting Stance 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

levels.name: Darting Stance 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

levels.name: Dazzle Far Trace
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (Rem.)】.

Inflicts Spd-4 on foe and foe cannot counterattack during combat.

【Canto (Rem.)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = any movement not already used that turn. (If unit used a movement skill that warped them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

levels.name: Dazzling Discord
levels.effect:
At start of turn, for the closest foes within 5 spaces of unit and foes within 2 spaces of those foes, if any foe's Res < unit's Res, inflicts 【Discord】on that foe. Inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot counterattack.

【Discord】
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-X on unit during combat (X = 2 + number of allies within 2 spaces of unit; max 5) through its next action.

levels.name: Dazzling Shift
levels.effect: Unit can move to a space adjacent to an ally within 2 spaces. Inflicts Spd-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot counterattack.

levels.name: Dazzling Staff 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, foe cannot counterattack.

levels.name: Dazzling Staff 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, foe cannot counterattack.

levels.name: Dazzling Staff 3
levels.effect: Foe cannot counterattack.

levels.name: Deadly Balance
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% or if【Penalty】is active on unit, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe and grants Special cooldown charge +1 per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. Special cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack deals 0 damage.)

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Deadly Balance+
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25% or if【Penalty】is active on unit, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack (only highest value applied; does not stack), and grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per foe's attack (only highest value applied; does not stack; Special cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack deals 0 damage) during combat, and also, if Special triggers, neutralizes "reduces damage by X%" effects from non-Special skills (excluding area-of-effect Specials). If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-2 to unit after combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Deadly Miasma
levels.effect:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat, and after combat, deals 7 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target and applies【Divine Vein (Haze)】on target's space and on each space within 2 spaces of target's space for 1 turn.

【Divine Vein (Haze)】
Applies the following effects on space: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat. (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out.)

levels.name: Death Blow Echo
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+4 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Death Blow 1
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+2 during combat.

levels.name: Death Blow 2
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat.

levels.name: Death Blow 3
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

levels.name: Death Blow 4
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+8 during combat.

levels.name: Deep Star
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (１)】.

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe and reduces damage from foe's first attack by X% during combat (if unit initiates combat, X = 80; otherwise, X = 30; stacks with other damage reduction effects, like that from【Deep Star】; "first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes). If unit initiates combat, grants【Deep Star】to unit and inflicts【Gravity】on target and foes within 1 space of target after combat.

【Canto (１)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

【Deep Star】
For 1 turn, if it is unit's first combat initiated by foe that turn, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 80% during combat (that turn only; "first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes).

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through its next action.

levels.name: Def Cantrip 1
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-3 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Def Cantrip 2
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-5 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Def Cantrip 3
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Def-7 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Def Feint 1

levels.name: Def Feint 2

levels.name: Def Feint 3
levels.effect: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Def Opening 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Def+2 to ally with the highest Def for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Def Opening 2

levels.name: Def Opening 3

levels.name: Def Ploy 1

levels.name: Def Ploy 2

levels.name: Def Ploy 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Def-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

levels.name: Def/Res Bond 1
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+3 during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Bond 2
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Bond 3
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+5 during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Bond 4
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Def/Res during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Catch 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Def/Res+3 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Def/Res Catch 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Def/Res Catch 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Def/Res+5 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Def/Res Catch 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Def/Res+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on foe, grants an additional Def/Res+2 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Def/Res Discord
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Def/Res-6 and【Discord】on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions.

Inflicts penalty on foe's Def/Res during combat = number of foes inflicted with【Discord】 within 2 spaces of target, including target, × 2, + 4 (max 10) and deals damage = 15% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Discord】
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-X on unit during combat (X = 2 + number of allies within 2 spaces of unit; max 5) through its next action.

levels.name: Def/Res Finish 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+2 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +1 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Def/Res Finish 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +3 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Def/Res Finish 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+6 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Def/Res Finish 4
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials), and when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

levels.name: Def/Res Form 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

levels.name: Def/Res Form 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

levels.name: Def/Res Form 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+X to unit during combat (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

levels.name: Def/Res Fortune
levels.effect:
If unit can transform, transformation effects gain "if unit is within 2 spaces of a beast or dragon ally, or if number of adjacent allies other than beast or dragon allies ≤ 2" as a trigger condition (in addition to existing conditions).

If defending in Aether Raids, at the start of enemy turn 1, if conditions for transforming are met, unit transforms.

If unit is transformed or if foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+8 to unit and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def during combat, and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Gap 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Def/Res+1 to ally with the highest Def+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Def/Res Gap 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Def/Res+3 to ally with the highest Def+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Def/Res Gap 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Def/Res+5 to ally with the highest Def+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Def/Res Hold
levels.effect: Inflicts Def/Res-4 on foes within 3 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Ideal 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Def/Res+3 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Def/Res Ideal 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Def/Res Ideal 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Def/Res+5 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Def/Res Ideal 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Def/Res+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, and【Bonus】is active on unit, grants an additional Def/Res+2 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Def/Res Link 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Def/Res Link 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Def/Res Link 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Def/Res Menace
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Def/Res-6 on closest foes through their next actions and grants Def/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Def/Res Oath 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+3 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Def/Res Oath 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Def/Res Oath 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Def/Res Oath 4
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+6 and the following status to unit for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces." If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+3 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Pledge
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+6 and "Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack)" to unit for 1 turn. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+3 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Ploy 3
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts Def/Res-7,【Ploy】, and【Exposure】 on those foes through their next actions.

【Ploy】
Neutralizes【Bonus Doubler】,【Treachery】, and【Grand Strategy】effects active on unit during combat through unit's next action.

【Exposure】
Foe's attacks deal +10 damage.

【Bonus Doubler】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

【Treachery】
Unit deals additional damage = total bonuses on unit for 1 turn.

【Grand Strategy】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current penalty on each of unit's stats × 2 for 1 turn. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Atk, grants Atk+14, for a net bonus of Atk+7.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.

Unit's negative effects that last "through unit's next action" will remain in effect until this status (Grand Strategy) is neutralized.

levels.name: Def/Res Rein 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Def/Res-2 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Rein 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Rein 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Def/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Ruse 1
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Def/Res Ruse 2
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Def/Res Ruse 3
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Def/Res Scowl 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Def/Res+2 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+15 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Def/Res Scowl 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Def/Res+4 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+12 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Def/Res Scowl 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Def/Res+6 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+9 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Def/Res Scowl 4
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Def/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+5 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Def/Res Smoke 3
levels.effect:
After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions, grants Atk+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn, and grants【Pathfinder】to unit for 1 turn.

【Pathfinder】
When an ally moves through unit's space, that space is counted as 0 spaces moved instead of 1 space. (Unit's space can be freely added to ally's normal movement. Applies only to allies with movement types that allow movement through unit's space.)

levels.name: Def/Res Snag 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Def/Res Snag 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Def/Res Snag 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Def/Res Solo 1
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Solo 2
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Solo 3
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Solo 4
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+7 during combat.

levels.name: Def/Res Unity
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+5 and bonus to Def/Res during combat = current penalty on each of those stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Def, grants Def+19, for a net bonus of Def+12.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.

levels.name: Def/Res 1
levels.effect: Grants Def/Res+1.

levels.name: Def/Res 2
levels.effect: Grants Def/Res+2.

levels.name: Def Smoke 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Def Smoke 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Def Smoke 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Def-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Def Tactic 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Def+2 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

levels.name: Def Tactic 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Def+4 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

levels.name: Def Tactic 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Def+6 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

levels.name: Defense +1
levels.effect: Grants Def+1.

levels.name: Defense +2
levels.effect: Grants Def+2.

levels.name: Defense +3
levels.effect: Grants Def+3.

levels.name: Defiant Atk 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+3 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Atk 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+5 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Atk 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+7 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Def 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+3 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Def 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+5 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Def 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+7 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Res 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+3 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Res 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+5 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Res 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Res+7 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Spd 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+3 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Spd 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+5 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Defiant Spd 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Spd+7 for 1 turn.

levels.name: Deflect Magic 1
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses magic, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 30%.

levels.name: Deflect Magic 2
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses magic, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 50%.

levels.name: Deflect Magic 3
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses magic, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 80%.

levels.name: Deflect Melee 1
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses a sword, lance, or axe, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 30%.

levels.name: Deflect Melee 2
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses a sword, lance, or axe, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 50%.

levels.name: Deflect Melee 3
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses a sword, lance, or axe, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 80%.

levels.name: Deflect Missile 1
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses bow or dagger, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 30%.

levels.name: Deflect Missile 2
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses bow or dagger, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 50%.

levels.name: Deflect Missile 3
levels.effect: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe uses bow or dagger, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 80%.

levels.name: Deluge Boost 3
levels.effect:
Grants HP+5.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Spd/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally with HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

levels.name: Deluge Dance 1
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 and Res+3 to target.

levels.name: Deluge Dance 2
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+3 and Res+4 to target.

levels.name: Desperation 1
levels.effect: If unit’s HP ≤ 25% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Desperation 2
levels.effect: If unit’s HP ≤ 50% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Desperation 3
levels.effect: If unit’s HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Desperation 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-4 on foe during combat. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 99% and unit initiates combat, or number of spaces from unit's start position to end position ≥ 2 and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Detailed Report
levels.effect:
Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

Foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

Foes cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains.)

levels.name: Diluvial Boost
levels.effect:
Grants HP+5.

If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 50% at start of combat, grants Atk/Def/Res+9 to unit during combat and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Disarm Trap 1
levels.effect: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 1, cancels trap's effect.

levels.name: Disarm Trap 2
levels.effect: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 3, cancels trap's effect.

levels.name: Disarm Trap 3
levels.effect: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect.

levels.name: Disarm Trap 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat, and if unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect; if unit ends movement on a space with a Hex Trap, reduces trap's trigger condition by 10 HP.

levels.name: Dist. Counter (D)
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

levels.name: Dist. Counter (M)
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

levels.name: Distant A/D Form
levels.effect:
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Def during combat = number of allies within 3 spaces of unit × 3 (max 9; if unit triggers Savior, value is treated as 9).

levels.name: Distant A/S Solo
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Distant Counter
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

levels.name: Distant D/R Solo
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+5 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Distant Dart
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+5 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Distant Def 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

levels.name: Distant Def 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

levels.name: Distant Def 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

levels.name: Distant Def 4
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+8 and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

levels.name: Distant Ferocity
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+5 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Distant Foil
levels.effect: If sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

levels.name: Distant Guard 1
levels.effect: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+2 during combat."

levels.name: Distant Guard 2
levels.effect: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+3 during combat."

levels.name: Distant Guard 3
levels.effect: Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+4 during combat."

levels.name: Distant Pressure
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Spd+5 during combat, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

levels.name: Distant Reversal
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe initiates combat, grants Def+5 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Distant Stance
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe initiates combat, grants Res+5 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Distant Storm
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk+5 during combat, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

levels.name: Distant Ward
levels.effect: If magic, staff, or dragonstone foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

levels.name: Dive-Bomb 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if both unit's and foe's HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Dive-Bomb 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if both unit's and foe's HP ≥ 90% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Dive-Bomb 3
levels.effect: At start of combat, if both unit's and foe's HP ≥ 80% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Divine Brawn
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (２)】.

Removes the condition to transform. If defending in Aether Raids, at the start of enemy turn 1, if unit can transform, unit transforms.

After start-of-turn effects trigger on player phase or enemy phase, neutralizes any 【Penalty】on unit (does not apply to【Penalty】effects that are applied at the same time).

At start of combat, if unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk-5, inflicts Atk/Def-7 on foe during combat. At start of combat, if unit's Def ≥ foe's Def-5, inflicts Atk/Def-7 on foe during combat.

Inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

【Canto (２)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Divine Deceit
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes in cardinal directions of unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts【Gravity】on those foes. At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts【Ploy】and【Exposure】on those foes through their next actions. After start-of-turn effects trigger on player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns have ≥ 3 Bonus effects active, excluding stat bonuses, neutralizes those effects (excludes Bonus effects being applied at the same time). If foe has any Penalty effects active, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during combat.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through its next action.

【Ploy】
Neutralizes Bonus Doubler, Treachery, and【Grand Strategy】effects active on unit during combat through unit's next action.

【Exposure】
Foe's attacks deal +10 damage.

【Grand Strategy】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current penalty on each of unit's stats × 2 for 1 turn. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Atk, grants Atk+14, for a net bonus of Atk+7.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.

Unit's negative effects that last "through unit's next action" will remain in effect until this status (Grand Strategy) is neutralized.

levels.name: Divine Fang
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants "effective against dragons" to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

levels.name: Divine Fang+
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants "effective against dragons" to adjacent allies for 1 turn. At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6 and the following status to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn: "If unit initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack."

levels.name: Divine God Fang
levels.effect:
Allies within 2 spaces of unit can move to any space within 2 spaces of unit.

At start of player phase or enemy phase, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants "effective against dragons," "neutralizes 'effective against dragons' bonuses," and 【Empathy】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn.

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit, unit deals +7 damage (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's attacks by 7 (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

【Empathy】
Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of types of【Bonus】effects, excluding stat bonuses, and【Penalty】effects, excluding stat penalties, active on player team and enemy team during combat (max 7).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Divine Nectar
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants 【Divine Nectar】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn.

If a Rally or movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by an ally with the【Divine Nectar】effect active (excluding unit), grants another action to that ally (once per turn; if another effect that grants action to unit has been activated at the same time, this effect is also considered to have been triggered).

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

【Divine Nectar】
Neutralizes【Deep Wounds】during combat.

Restores 20 HP to unit as unit's combat begins (triggers after effects that deal damage as combat begins; only highest value applied; does not stack). If it is unit's first combat initiated by foe or first combat initiated by unit that turn, reduces damage from foe's attacks by 10 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its next action.

levels.name: Divine Recreation
levels.effect: At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe during combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30%, and boosts unit's next attack by total damage reduced (by any source, including other skills). Resets at end of combat.

levels.name: Divine Rec. II
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 50% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe, reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's first attack by 50% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and unit's next attack deals damage = total damage reduced from foe's first attack (by any source, including other skills; resets at end of combat).

levels.name: Divine Strength
levels.effect:
Removes the condition to transform.

After start-of-turn effects trigger on player phase or enemy phase, neutralizes any 【Penalty】on unit (does not apply to【Penalty】effects that are applied at the same time).

Inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit after combat. If unit's Atk at start of combat ≥ foe's Atk at start of combat - 5, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat. If unit's Def at start of combat ≥ foe's Def at start of combat - 5, inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Divine Talon
levels.effect:
At start of turn, neutralizes any【Penalty】 effects on unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit (excluding penalties inflicted at the start of the same turn), and deals 1 damage to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit.

At start of turn, grants "unit can move 1 extra space" to dragon, beast, infantry, and armored allies within 2 spaces of unit (that turn only; does not stack).

If unit is transformed or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks, neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit, and reduces damage from foe's attacks by X during combat (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat × 4; max 12), and also, when foe's attack triggers foe's Special, reduces damage by X (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Divine Toxin
levels.effect:
If unit can transform, transformation effects gain "if unit is within 2 spaces of a beast or dragon ally, or if number of adjacent allies other than beast or dragon allies ≤ 2" as a trigger condition (in addition to existing conditions).

If defending in Aether Raids, at the start of enemy turn 1, if conditions for transforming are met, unit transforms.

At start of player phase or enemy phase, grants【Dosage】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn.

If unit is transformed or if foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def/Res+10 to unit, neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack (only highest value applied; does not stack), and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

【Dosage】
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit during combat and restores 10 HP to unit after combat.

When a foe triggers both "grants the【Bonus】effects active on foe" and "neutralizes any【Bonus】active on foe" effects from skills such as Essence Drain on unit with this status active, prevents those effects on unit and other targets and neutralizes any【Bonus】effects active on that foe (does not neutralize【Bonus】effects applied at the same time).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Domain of Flame
levels.effect: Grants Atk/Def+4 and the effect "if unit's Atk > foe's Res during combat, unit's first attack deals damage = 30% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res" to allies within 2 spaces during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Atk > foe's Res during combat, unit's first attack deals damage = 30% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res.

levels.name: Domain of Ice
levels.effect: Grants Spd/Res+4 and the effect "reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30%" to allies within 2 spaces during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30% during combat.

levels.name: Double Lion
levels.effect: If unit's HP = 100% at start of combat and unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice, but deals 1 damage to unit after combat. (Does not stack.)

levels.name: Drag Back
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat. Target foe moves to unit's previous space.

levels.name: Dragon Exp. 1
levels.effect: While unit lives and uses a dragonstone, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dragon Exp. 2
levels.effect: While unit lives, all dragonstone allies on team get 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dragon Exp. 3
levels.effect: While unit lives, all dragonstone allies on team get 2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dragon Monarch
levels.effect:
After unit acts (if Canto triggers, after Canto), applies【Divine Vein (Stone)】to spaces within 5 rows and 5 columns centered on unit for 1 turn. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to allies within 5 rows and 5 columns centered on unit and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on those allies during combat. If there is an ally within 5 rows and 5 columns centered on unit, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit, reduces damage from attacks by 30% (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

【Divine Vein (Stone)】
Applies the following effects on space for unit and allies: Grants Def/Res+6 during combat, reduces damage from foe's Specials by 10 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from area-of-effect Specials by 50% (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out. Does not count as defensive terrain.)

levels.name: Dragon Valor 1
levels.effect:
While unit lives and uses a dragonstone, unit gets 1.5x SP.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dragon Valor 2
levels.effect:
While unit lives, all dragonstone allies on team get 1.5x SP.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dragon Valor 3
levels.effect:
While unit lives, all dragonstone allies on team get 2x SP.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dragon Wall 1
levels.effect: If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 2 (max 20%).

levels.name: Dragon Wall 2
levels.effect: If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%).

levels.name: Dragon Wall 3
levels.effect: If unit's Res > foe's Res, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

levels.name: Dragon's Ire 1
levels.effect: If unit's HP = 100% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

levels.name: Dragon's Ire 2
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

levels.name: Dragon's Ire 3
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

levels.name: Dragon's Ire 4
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe during combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and also, if foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

levels.name: Dragon's Scales
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def/Res-X on foe (X = 4 + the greater of the difference between Def stats or difference between Res stats (unit's Def/Res minus foe's Def/Res); max 11; if either of unit's stats < foe's stat, difference is treated as 0), unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's first attack, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Dragon's Wrath 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 10% during combat, and also, if unit's Atk > foe's Res, unit's first attack deals damage = 10% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res during combat.

levels.name: Dragon's Wrath 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 15% during combat, and also, if unit's Atk > foe's Res, unit's first attack deals damage = 15% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res during combat.

levels.name: Dragon's Wrath 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 20% during combat, and also, if unit's Atk > foe's Res, unit's first attack deals damage = 20% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res during combat.

levels.name: Dragon's Wrath 4
levels.effect: Reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 25%. If unit's Atk > foe's Res, unit's first attack deals damage = 25% of unit's Atk minus foe's Res during combat.

levels.name: Dragonhide
levels.effect: Neutralizes "effective against armored" bonuses. If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-8 on foe and grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Dragonscale
levels.effect: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on foe and grants Special cooldown charge +1 per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. Special cooldown charge granted even if foe’s attack deals 0 damage.)

levels.name: Dragonskin
levels.effect:
Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.
If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat.

levels.name: Dragonskin II
levels.effect: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 to unit during combat and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.).

levels.name: Dragoon Shield
levels.effect: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses. Grants Atk/Spd/Def+3.

levels.name: Dream Deliverer
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, neutralizes any 【Penalty】that takes effect on unit or allies within 2 spaces of unit at this time. At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+6 and【Resonance: Shields】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn. If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Def/Res+4 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

【Resonance: Shields】
Grants Def/Res+4 during combat and the following effect for 1 turn: "During unit's first combat in player phase or enemy phase, foe cannot make a follow-up attack."

levels.name: Drive Atk 1
levels.effect: Grants Atk+2 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Drive Atk 2
levels.effect: Grants Atk+3 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Drive Def 1
levels.effect: Grants Def+2 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Drive Def 2
levels.effect: Grants Def+3 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Drive Res 1
levels.effect: Grants Res+2 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Drive Res 2
levels.effect: Grants Res+3 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Drive Spd 1
levels.effect: Grants Spd+2 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Drive Spd 2
levels.effect: Grants Spd+3 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Duality
levels.effect: Grants Atk/Res+9. Grants weapon-triangle advantage against and inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage on red, blue, and green foes during combat. Neutralizes effects that boost values along with weapon-triangle advantage or reduce values along with weapon-triangle disadvantage (Triangle Adept) on unit and foe. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat.

levels.name: Dull Close 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

levels.name: Dull Close 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

levels.name: Dull Close 3
levels.effect: If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

levels.name: Dull Ranged 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

levels.name: Dull Ranged 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

levels.name: Dull Ranged 3
levels.effect: If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

levels.name: Earth Boost 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+2 during combat.

levels.name: Earth Boost 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+4 during combat.

levels.name: Earth Boost 3
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ foe's HP+3, grants Def+6 during combat.

levels.name: Earth Dance 1
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+3 to target.

levels.name: Earth Dance 2
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+4 to target.

levels.name: Earth Dance 3
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+5 to target.

levels.name: Earthfire Boost 3
levels.effect: Grants HP+5. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Def+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally with HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

levels.name: Earthwind Boost 3
levels.effect: Grants HP+5. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Spd/Def+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally with HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack).

levels.name: Edged Scales
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe, deals damage = 15% of foe's Atk (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's first attack by 10 ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and increases the Spd difference necessary for foe to make a follow-up attack by 10 during combat, and also, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

levels.name: Elixir Seal
levels.effect:
When the holder of this seal is defeated, restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit after combat, and an【Elixir】drops.

【Elixir】
Restores 99 HP to all allies

levels.name: Embla's Ward
levels.effect: Reduces damage dealt to unit to 0.

levels.name: Emblems' Miracle
levels.effect: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+9 to unit during combat and reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by 40% ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes). If the number of allies within 3 spaces of unit ≥ 3 and foe initiates combat, if unit's HP > 1 and foe would reduce unit's HP to 0 during combat, unit survives with 1 HP, and after combat, restores 99 HP to unit (effect only triggers for player's team once per map and does not stack with non-Special effects that allow unit to survive with 1 HP if foe's attack would reduce unit's HP to 0; when any other such effect triggers on a unit granted this effect, this effect will trigger too).

levels.name: Endless Tempest
levels.effect:
At start of turn, unit can move 1 extra space (that turn only; does not stack).

If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat (max 3) and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

levels.name: Escape Route 1
levels.effect: If unit’s HP ≤ 30%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

levels.name: Escape Route 2
levels.effect: If unit’s HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

levels.name: Escape Route 3
levels.effect: If unit’s HP ≤ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

levels.name: Escape Route 4
levels.effect:
When unit's HP ≤ 99%, enables【Canto (１)】 (also activates if conditions are met due to effects after combat).

Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 99%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 3 spaces. If unit's HP ≤ 60%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

【Canto (１)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

levels.name: Even Atk Wave N
levels.effect:
At start of turn, grants Atk+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn.

If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk-5, unit deals +5 damage during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and also, when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 5 HP to unit (triggers even if 0 damage is dealt).

If it is an even-numbered turn, grants Atk+6 to unit during combat.

levels.name: Even Atk Wave 1
levels.effect:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Atk+2 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.
(Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

levels.name: Even Atk Wave 2
levels.effect:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Atk+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.
(Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

levels.name: Even Atk Wave 3
levels.effect:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Atk+6 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.
(Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

At start of even-numbered turns, grants Def+2 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.
(Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

At start of even-numbered turns, grants Def+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.
(Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)
