levels.name: Sacae's Blessing
levels.effect:
If foe uses sword, lance, or axe, foe cannot counterattack.
(Skill cannot be inherited.)

levels.name: Savage Blow 1
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 3 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

levels.name: Savage Blow 2
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 5 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

levels.name: Savage Blow 3
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

levels.name: Savvy Fighter 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd is ≥ foe's Spd, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 10%.

levels.name: Savvy Fighter 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd is ≥ foe's Spd-2, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 20%.

levels.name: Savvy Fighter 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd is ≥ foe's Spd-4, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 30%.

levels.name: Savvy Fighter 4
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat, and also, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-10, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes).

levels.name: Scendscale
levels.effect: Deals damage = 25% of unit's Atk, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage to unit.

levels.name: Scowling Fighter
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foe, deals damage = 20% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's attacks by 20% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack), and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+5, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack during combat (cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown).

levels.name: Seal Atk/Def 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk/Def 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk/Res 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk/Res 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk/Res 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe and additional penalty to foe's Atk/Res = 6 - current penalty on each of those stats during combat (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently; still inflicts penalty on foe even if foe triggers an effect that neutralizes penalties during combat). If penalty is active on foe's Atk or Res, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Atk/Res-6 on foe through its next action.

levels.name: Seal Atk/Spd 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk/Spd 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Atk 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Atk-4 on foe during combat, and if no effect neutralizes penalties to foe's Atk, inflicts penalty on foe's Atk during combat = 7 - current penalty on foe's Atk (min: 0). If penalty is active on foe's Atk, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) Inflicts Atk-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Def/Res 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Def/Res 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Def/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Def/Res 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe and additional penalty to foe's Def/Res = 6 - current penalty on each of those stats during combat (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently; still inflicts penalty on foe even if foe triggers an effect that neutralizes penalties during combat). If penalty is active on foe's Def or Res, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Def/Res-6 on foe through its next action.

levels.name: Seal Def 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Def 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Def 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Def-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Def 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Def-4 on foe during combat, and if no effect neutralizes penalties to foe's Def, inflicts penalty on foe's Def during combat = 7 - current penalty on foe's Def (min: 0). If penalty is active on foe's Def, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) Inflicts Def-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Res 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Res 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Res 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Res-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Res 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Res-4 on foe during combat, and if no effect neutralizes penalties to foe's Res, inflicts penalty on foe's Res during combat = 7 - current penalty on foe's Res (min: 0). If penalty is active on foe's Res, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) Inflicts Res-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Spd/Def 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Spd/Def 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Spd/Def 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and additional penalty to foe's Spd/Def = 6 - current penalty on each of those stats during combat (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently; still inflicts penalty on foe even if foe triggers an effect that neutralizes penalties during combat). If penalty is active on foe's Spd or Def, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Spd/Def-6 on foe through its next action.

levels.name: Seal Spd/Res 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Spd/Res 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Spd/Res 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe and additional penalty to foe's Spd/Res = 6 - current penalty on each of those stats during combat (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently; still inflicts penalty on foe even if foe triggers an effect that neutralizes penalties during combat). If penalty is active on foe's Spd or Res, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack). After combat, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on foe through its next action.

levels.name: Seal Spd 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Spd 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Spd 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Seal Spd 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-4 on foe during combat, and if no effect neutralizes penalties to foe's Spd, inflicts penalty on foe's Spd during combat = 7 - current penalty on foe's Spd (min: 0). If penalty is active on foe's Spd, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.) Inflicts Spd-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

levels.name: Self-Improver
levels.effect: Grants Atk+10, Spd+5, Def+20. Inflicts Res-5. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Severance
levels.effect:
At start of turn, inflicts【Undefended】and 【Feud】on foes within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit. At start of turn, if a foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit, neutralizes any【Penalty】(excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn) and grants 【Dodge】to unit.

【Undefended】
Unit cannot be protected by Savior through their next action.

【Feud】
Disables all ally skills (excluding unit's) during combat through unit's next action.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

【Dodge】
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

levels.name: Severance+
levels.effect:
If unit can transform, transformation effects gain "if any foe is within 3 columns or 3 rows centered on unit" as a trigger condition (in addition to existing conditions).

If defending in Aether Raids, at the start of enemy turn 1, if conditions for transforming are met, unit transforms.

At start of turn, if any foe is within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit, inflicts 【Undefended】and【Feud】on those foes, and neutralizes any penalties (excluding penalties inflicted at start of turn) and grants【Dodge】 to unit.

If unit is transformed or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit, unit deals +7 damage (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before unit's first attack during combat.

【Undefended】
Unit cannot be protected by Savior through their next action.

【Feud】
Disables all ally skills (excluding unit's) during combat through unit's next action.

【Dodge】
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

levels.name: Shadow Shift 1
levels.effect:
If unit's HP = 100%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use【Reposition】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

【Reposition】
Range = 1. Target moves to opposite side of unit.

levels.name: Shadow Shift 2
levels.effect:
If unit's HP ≥ 50%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use【Reposition】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

【Reposition】
Range = 1. Target moves to opposite side of unit.

levels.name: Shadow Shift 3
levels.effect:
If unit's HP ≥ 25%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use【Reposition】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

【Reposition】
Range = 1. Target moves to opposite side of unit.

levels.name: Shadow Shift 4
levels.effect:
When Canto triggers, enables unit to use 【Reposition】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 to unit during combat and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

【Reposition】
Range = 1. Target moves to opposite side of unit.

levels.name: Shadow Slide
levels.effect:
Unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of any ally that has entered combat during the current turn. Unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of any ally within 2 spaces. If ally has entered combat during the current turn, unit can move through foes' spaces.

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe, deals damage = 20% of unit's Spd (excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 7 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes).

levels.name: Shadow Smite 1
levels.effect:
If unit's HP = 100%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use【Smite】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

【Smite】
Range = 1. Pushes target ally 2 spaces away.

levels.name: Shadow Smite 2
levels.effect:
If unit's HP ≥ 50%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use【Smite】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

【Smite】
Range = 1. Pushes target ally 2 spaces away.

levels.name: Shadow Smite 3
levels.effect:
If unit's HP ≥ 25%, when Canto triggers, enables unit to use【Smite】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

【Smite】
Range = 1. Pushes target ally 2 spaces away.

levels.name: Shadow Smite 4
levels.effect:
When Canto triggers, enables unit to use 【Smite】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).

If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 to unit during combat and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

【Smite】
Range = 1. Pushes target ally 2 spaces away.

levels.name: Shield Fighter
levels.effect:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe during combat.

If foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, triggers the following effects during combat: grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's first attack; if foe's first attack triggers the "attacks twice" effect, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's second strike as well; grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before foe's first follow-up attack. If foe's attack triggers unit's Special and Special has the "reduces damage by X%" effect, Special triggers twice, then reduces damage by 7. Each Special trigger is calculated as a separate activation.

levels.name: Shield of Hope
levels.effect:
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks, and grants effects based on the total value of bonuses on the 3 allies with the highest bonus totals during combat (excluding unit):

If value ≥ 20, if decreasing the Spd difference necessary to make a follow-up attack by 10 would allow unit to trigger a follow-up attack (excluding guaranteed or prevented follow-ups), triggers【Potent Follow 100%】; if value ≥ 40, if foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack; and if value ≥ 60, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks, and also, if it is first combat initiated by foe that turn, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe's next attack.

【Potent Follow 100%】
Triggers an additional follow-up attack immediately after unit's standard follow-up attack and deals damage = 100% of unit's normal attack damage (if unit cannot make a follow-up attack, this effect triggers when the standard follow-up attack would occur; this effect is treated like a follow-up attack, so effects like "reduce damage by X%" still apply, but this effect is not affected by effects that prevent follow-ups or "attacks twice" effects; only highest value applied; does not stack).

levels.name: Shield Pulse 1
levels.effect: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1.

levels.name: Shield Pulse 2
levels.effect: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1. Reduces damage dealt to unit by 5 when Special triggers.

levels.name: Shield Pulse 3
levels.effect: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-2. Reduces damage dealt to unit by 5 when Special triggers.

levels.name: Shield Session 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Def/Res during combat = 3 - number of foes who have already acted (min value of 1).

levels.name: Shield Session 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Def/Res during combat = 6 - number of foes who have already acted × 2 (min value of 2).

levels.name: Shield Session 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Def/Res during combat = 9 - number of foes who have already acted × 3 (min value of 3).

levels.name: Silence Ward 1
levels.effect:
For allies within 2 spaces of unit, grants Atk/Res+1 and neutralizes effects that prevent ally's counterattacks during combat.

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+1 to unit and neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

levels.name: Silence Ward 2
levels.effect:
For allies within 2 spaces of unit, grants Atk/Res+2 and neutralizes effects that prevent ally's counterattacks during combat.

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+2 to unit and neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

levels.name: Silence Ward 3
levels.effect:
For allies within 2 spaces of unit, grants Atk/Res+3 and neutralizes effects that prevent ally's counterattacks during combat.

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+3 to unit and neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

levels.name: Silence Ward 4
levels.effect:
For allies within 2 spaces of unit, grants Atk/Res+4 and neutralizes effects that prevent ally's counterattacks during combat, and also, if ally's attack can trigger ally's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1 to ally before ally's first attack during combat.

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit and neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat, and also, if unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before unit's first attack during combat.

levels.name: Slick Fighter 1
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 75% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

levels.name: Slick Fighter 2
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

levels.name: Slick Fighter 3
levels.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 25% and foe initiates combat, neutralizes penalties on unit during combat and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

levels.name: Slick Fighter 4
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat, inflicts Atk-5 on foe, deals +X damage (X = 20% of unit's Def; excluding area-of-effect Specials), reduces damage from foe's attacks by X (excluding area-of-effect Specials), unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, and neutralizes penalties on unit during combat.

levels.name: Sly Echo
levels.effect:
If unit initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat, and also, if number of【Bonus】effects active on unit ≥ 2, excluding stat bonuses, or if number of【Penalty】effects active on foe ≥ 2, excluding stat penalties, unit deals +5 damage during combat (including when dealing damage with an area-of-effect Special; excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Sly Mirror
levels.effect:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+8 and Res+10 to unit and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat, and also, if number of【Bonus】effects active on unit ≥ 2, excluding stat bonuses, or if number of 【Penalty】effects active on foe ≥ 2, excluding stat penalties, unit deals +5 damage during combat (including when dealing damage with an area-of-effect Special; excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Sly Sturdy Blow
levels.effect:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+8 and Def+10 to unit and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat, and also, if number of【Bonus】effects active on unit ≥ 2, excluding stat bonuses, or if number of 【Penalty】effects active on foe ≥ 2, excluding stat penalties, unit deals +5 damage during combat (including when dealing damage with an area-of-effect Special; excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Sly Swift Sparrow
levels.effect:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+8 to unit and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat, and also, if number of 【Bonus】effects active on unit ≥ 2, excluding stat bonuses, or if number of 【Penalty】effects active on foe ≥ 2, excluding stat penalties, unit deals +5 damage during combat (including when dealing damage with an area-of-effect Special; excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Soaring Echo
levels.effect: Infantry and flying allies within 2 spaces can move to a space within 2 spaces of unit.

levels.name: Soaring Guidance
levels.effect: Infantry and flying allies within 2 spaces of unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of unit. Grants Atk/Spd+3 to infantry and flying allies within 2 spaces of unit during combat, and also, if those allies' Spd > foe's Spd, neutralizes effects that prevent those allies' follow-up attacks during combat.

levels.name: Soaring Wings
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (１)】.

Unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of any ally within 2 spaces. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Spd/Def-X on foe during combat (X = 4 + number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiates combat; max 8).

【Canto (１)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

levels.name: Solar Brace
levels.effect: Restores HP = 30% of damage dealt when Special triggers. (Stacks with effects of skills like Sol.)

levels.name: Solar Brace II
levels.effect:
Enables【Canto (２)】.

Neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat. Restores 10 HP to unit after combat.

【Canto (２)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

levels.name: Solid Ground 1
levels.effect: Grants Atk/Def+3. Inflicts Res-3.

levels.name: Solid Ground 2
levels.effect: Grants Atk/Def+4. Inflicts Res-4.

levels.name: Solid Ground 3
levels.effect: Grants Atk/Def+5. Inflicts Res-5.

levels.name: Solid Ground 4
levels.effect: Grants Atk/Def+7. Inflicts Res-5.

levels.name: Solitary Dream
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Sorcery Blade 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

levels.name: Sorcery Blade 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

levels.name: Sorcery Blade 3
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

levels.name: Soul of Zofia
levels.effect: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks or prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

levels.name: Soul of Zofia II
levels.effect: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Spd-5 on foe and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% (example: a foe with a "reduce damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead).

levels.name: Sparkling Boost
levels.effect: At start of turn, restores 10 HP to ally that has been dealt the most damage. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Sparkling Boost+
levels.effect: At start of turn, restores 20 HP to ally that has been dealt the most damage. (Excludes unit.) At start of any ally's combat, if ally's HP ≥ 50%, grants Res+5 to ally during combat. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd Cantrip 1
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Spd-3 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd Cantrip 2
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Spd-5 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd Cantrip 3
levels.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Spd-7 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd/Def Bond 1
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+3 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Bond 2
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Bond 3
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+5 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Bond 4
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Spd/Def during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Bulwark 1
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe during combat. Restores 3 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Bulwark 2
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe during combat. Restores 5 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Bulwark 3
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Catch 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Spd/Def+3 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Def Catch 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Def Catch 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Spd/Def+5 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Def Catch 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Spd/Def+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on foe, grants an additional Spd/Def+2 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Def Clash 1
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Spd/Def during combat = X + 1. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 1.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Clash 2
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Spd/Def during combat = X + 3. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 2.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Clash 3
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Spd/Def during combat = X + 5. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 3.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Clash 4
levels.effect: If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants bonus to unit's Spd/Def during combat = X + 6. (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 4.) If X ≥ 2, neutralizes unit's penalties to Spd/Def during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Crux
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit, and those foes suffer guaranteed follow-up attacks during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Detect
levels.effect:
Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat.

If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts【Exposure】on closest foes within 5 spaces of both unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally after movement and foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions.

Inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foes on the map with the 【Exposure】effect active and neutralizes bonuses to Spd/Def for those foes during combat.

【Exposure】
Foe's attacks deal +10 damage.

levels.name: Spd/Def Finish 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Def+2 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +1 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Spd/Def Finish 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +3 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Spd/Def Finish 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Def+6 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials).

levels.name: Spd/Def Finish 4
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Def+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials), and when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Form 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

levels.name: Spd/Def Form 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

levels.name: Spd/Def Form 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

levels.name: Spd/Def Gap 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+1 to ally with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Gap 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+3 to ally with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Gap 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd/Def+5 to ally with the highest Spd+Def total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Hold
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foes within 3 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Ideal 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Def+3 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Def Ideal 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Def Ideal 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Def+5 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Def Ideal 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Def+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and【Bonus】is active on unit, grants an additional Spd/Def+2 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Def Link 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Def Link 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Def Link 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Def Link 4
levels.effect:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+6 and【Canto (１)】to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn. Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe and unit deals +X damage during combat (X = highest total Spd+Def bonuses among unit and allies with【Canto (１)】active; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Canto (１)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest value applied. Does not stack. After moving, if a skill that grants another action would be triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will trigger after the granted action. Unit's base movement has no effect on movement granted. Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance greater than unit would be able to move with normal Canto movement.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Menace
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Spd/Def-6 on nearest foes through their next actions and grants Spd/Def+6 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Def Oath 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+3 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Def Oath 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Def Oath 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+5 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Def Prime 1
levels.effect:
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of【Bonus】effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, × 2, + 1; max 3).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Def Prime 2
levels.effect:
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of【Bonus】effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, × 2, + 1; max 5).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Def Prime 3
levels.effect:
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of【Bonus】effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, × 2, + 3; max 7).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Def Prime 4
levels.effect:
If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of【Bonus】effects active on unit, excluding stat bonuses, × 2, + 3; max 9), and also, if number of【Bonus】effects active on unit (excluding stat bonuses) ≥ 4, unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Def Rein 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Rein 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Rein 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Ruse 1
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Ruse 2
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Ruse 3
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Spd/Def Ruse 4
levels.effect:
Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-6,【Guard】, 【Discord】, and【Schism】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

【Discord】
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-X on unit during combat (X = 2 + number of allies within 2 spaces of unit; max 5) through its next action.

【Schism】
Neutralizes Triangle Attack, Dual Strike, and Pathfinder effects active on unit through unit's next action. Unit is excluded from ally Triangle Attack and Dual Strike effects calculated using numbers of allies. When this status (Schism) is neutralized, Triangle Attack, Dual Strike, and Pathfinder effects are also neutralized.

levels.name: Spd/Def Snag 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd/Def Snag 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd/Def Snag 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and targeted ally through their next action.

levels.name: Spd/Def Snag 4
levels.effect:
Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Def-7 and【Sabotage】on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target ally after movement and on foes within 2 spaces of those foes equipped with a skill that can trigger the Savior effect through their next actions.

【Sabotage】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest penalty on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit through its next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

levels.name: Spd/Def Solo 1
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+2 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Solo 2
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Solo 3
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+6 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Solo 4
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+7 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Tempo 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Tempo 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Tempo 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Def Tempo 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe, neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduces damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (example: a foe with a "reduces damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead).

levels.name: Spd/Def Unity
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Def+5 and bonus to Spd/Def during combat = current penalty on each of those stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Spd, grants Spd+19, for a net bonus of Spd+12.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.

levels.name: Spd/Def 1
levels.effect: Grants Spd/Def+1.

levels.name: Spd/Def 2
levels.effect: Grants Spd/Def+2.

levels.name: Spd Feint 1
levels.effect: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd Feint 2
levels.effect: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd Feint 3
levels.effect: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd Opening 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+2 to ally with the highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd Opening 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+4 to ally with the highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd Opening 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+6 to ally with the highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd Ploy 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd Ploy 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd Ploy 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd Preempt 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-2 on foe during combat. If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+5, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack. (Excluding when unit's Savior effect triggers.)

levels.name: Spd Preempt 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-3 on foe during combat. If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+3, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack. (Excluding when unit's Savior effect triggers.)

levels.name: Spd Preempt 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-4 on foe during combat. If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and unit's Spd > foe's Spd, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack. (Excluding when unit's Savior effect triggers.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Bond 1
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+3 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Bond 2
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Bond 3
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+5 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Bond 4
levels.effect: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's penalties to Spd/Res during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Bulwark 1
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foe during combat. Restores 3 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Bulwark 2
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe during combat. Restores 5 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Bulwark 3
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.) Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe during combat. Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: S/R Bulwark 4
levels.effect: Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit, and foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills). Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 40% during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes). Restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Catch 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Spd/Res+3 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Res Catch 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Res Catch 3
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Spd/Res+5 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Res Catch 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Spd/Res+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on foe, grants an additional Spd/Res+2 to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Res Crux
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit, and those foes suffer guaranteed follow-up attacks during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Detect
levels.effect:
Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe during combat.

If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts【Exposure】on closest foes within 5 spaces of both unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally after movement and foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions.

Inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foes on the map with the 【Exposure】effect active and neutralizes bonuses to Spd/Res for those foes during combat.

【Exposure】
Foe's attacks deal +10 damage.

levels.name: Spd/Res Discord
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Spd/Res-6 and【Discord】on foes with Res < unit's Res and that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions.

Inflicts penalty on foe's Spd/Res during combat = number of foes inflicted with【Discord】 within 2 spaces of target, including target, × 2, + 4 (max 10) and deals damage = 15% of unit's Res (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Discord】
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-X on unit during combat (X = 2 + number of allies within 2 spaces of unit; max 5) through its next action.

levels.name: Spd/Res Finish 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+2 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +1 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Finish 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +3 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Finish 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+6 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat. (Except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Finish 4
levels.effect: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered before or during this combat, deals +5 damage during combat (except when dealing damage with area-of-effect Specials), and when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Form 1
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3).

levels.name: Spd/Res Form 2
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+X to unit during combat (X = number of allies within 2 spaces + 2; max 5).

levels.name: Spd/Res Form 3
levels.effect: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Spd/Res+X to unit during combat (X = 2 × number of allies within 2 spaces, + 1; max 7).

levels.name: Spd/Res Gap 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd/Res+1 to ally with the highest Spd+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Gap 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd/Res+3 to ally with the highest Spd+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Gap 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd/Res+5 to ally with the highest Spd+Res total for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Havoc
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, inflicts Spd/Res-7,【Sabotage】, and【Schism】on foes with Res < unit's Res that are within 2 spaces of another foe through their next actions.

After start-of-turn skills trigger on unit's player phase, if the number of foes with the 【Sabotage】effect active on the map ≥ 2, grants 【Canto (１)】to unit for 1 turn.

Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe and deals damage = 20% of unit's Res during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Sabotage】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest penalty on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit through its next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

【Schism】
Neutralizes Triangle Attack, Dual Strike, and Pathfinder effects active on unit through unit's next action. Unit is excluded from ally Triangle Attack and Dual Strike effects calculated using numbers of allies. When this status (Schism) is neutralized, Triangle Attack, Dual Strike, and Pathfinder effects are also neutralized.

【Canto (１)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s). (Once per turn. Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Hexblade
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a magic ally, grants【Hexblade】to unit. If【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Res+7 to unit during combat.

【Hexblade】
Calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res during combat for 1 turn (including damage dealt by Specials before combat).

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Res Hold
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foes within 3 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Ideal 1
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Res+3 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Res Ideal 2
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Res+5 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% or if【Bonus】is active on unit, grants Spd/Res+7 to unit during combat. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and【Bonus】is active on unit, grants an additional Spd/Res+2 to unit during combat.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

levels.name: Spd/Res Link 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Res Link 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Res Link 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Res Menace
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is within 4 spaces of a foe, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on nearest foes through their next actions and grants Spd/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Res Oath 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+3 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Res Oath 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Res Oath 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn.

levels.name: Spd/Res Ploy 3
levels.effect:
At start of player phase or enemy phase, if any foes within 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit have Res < unit's Res+5, inflicts Spd/Res-7,【Ploy】, and【Exposure】 on those foes through their next actions.

【Ploy】
Neutralizes【Bonus Doubler】,【Treachery】, and【Grand Strategy】effects active on unit during combat through unit's next action.

【Exposure】
Foe's attacks deal +10 damage.

【Bonus Doubler】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

【Treachery】
Unit deals additional damage = total bonuses on unit for 1 turn.

【Grand Strategy】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current penalty on each of unit's stats × 2 for 1 turn. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Atk, grants Atk+14, for a net bonus of Atk+7.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.

Unit's negative effects that last "through unit's next action" will remain in effect until this status (Grand Strategy) is neutralized.

levels.name: Spd/Res Rein 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Rein 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Rein 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Ruse 1
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Ruse 2
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Ruse 3
levels.effect:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Scowl 1
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Spd/Res+2 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+15 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Scowl 2
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+12 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Scowl 3
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Spd/Res+6 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+9 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Scowl 4
levels.effect: If foe initiates combat or foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat, grants Spd/Res+7 to unit during combat, and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special and unit's Res ≥ foe's Res+5 during combat, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack. (Cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

levels.name: Spd/Res Shackle
levels.effect:
At start of turn, and after unit acts (if Canto triggers, after Canto), inflicts【Spd Shackle】 and【Res Shackle】on closest foes and foes within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions.

Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe and deals damage = number of【Penalty】effects active on foe, excluding stat penalties, × 2, + 7 during combat (max 15; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Spd Shackle】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Spd during combat = number of【Penalty】effects active on unit + 4, excluding stat penalties (max 8; through unit's next action).

【Res Shackle】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Res during combat = number of【Penalty】effects active on unit + 4, excluding stat penalties (max 8; through unit's next action).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

levels.name: Spd/Res Snag 1
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-2 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd/Res Snag 2
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd/Res Snag 3
levels.effect: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of both unit and target through their next actions.

levels.name: Spd/Res Solo 1
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+2 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Solo 2
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+4 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Solo 3
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+6 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Solo 4
levels.effect: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Res+7 during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Tempo 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Tempo 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Tempo 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

levels.name: Spd/Res Tempo 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe, neutralizes effects that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit, and reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduces damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (example: a foe with a "reduces damage by 45%" skill would reduce damage by 23% instead).

levels.name: Spd/Res 1
levels.effect: Grants Spd/Res+1.

levels.name: Spd/Res 2
levels.effect: Grants Spd/Res+2.

levels.name: Spd Smoke 1
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Spd Smoke 2
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Spd Smoke 3
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

levels.name: Spd Smoke 4
levels.effect:
After combat, inflicts Spd-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions, and grants Spd+6 and【Dodge】 to unit for 1 turn.

【Dodge】
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

levels.name: Spd Tactic 1
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+2 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

levels.name: Spd Tactic 2
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+4 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

levels.name: Spd Tactic 3
levels.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+6 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

levels.name: Special Fighter 1
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Special Fighter 2
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 70%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Special Fighter 3
levels.effect: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

levels.name: Special Fighter 4
levels.effect:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 40%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack (only highest value applied; does not stack), reduces the effect of【Deep Wounds】by 50% during combat, and also, if unit deals damage to foe using a Special, restores HP = 30% of damage dealt (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its next action.

levels.name: Special Spiral 1
levels.effect: If unit initiates combat and unit's Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 after combat.

levels.name: Special Spiral 2
levels.effect: If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 after combat.

levels.name: Special Spiral 3
levels.effect: If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-2 after combat.

levels.name: Special Spiral 4
levels.effect:
Deals +5 damage when Special triggers.
If Special triggers, neutralizes "reduces damage by X%" effects from non-Special skills (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-2 after combat.

levels.name: Speed +1
levels.effect: Grants Spd+1.

levels.name: Speed +2
levels.effect: Grants Spd+2.

levels.name: Speed +3
levels.effect: Grants Spd+3.

levels.name: Speedtaker 1
levels.effect:
At start of turn, grants Spd【Great Talent】+1 to unit.

After combat, if unit attacked, grants Spd【Great Talent】+1 to unit.

Deals damage = 5% of unit's Spd during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

(This skill grants max of【Great Talent】+5.)

【Great Talent】
Adds value of Great Talent (+X) to specified stats (until end of battle; max value of X is determined by the stat reaching the limit of 99, each stat calculated separately and cannot exceed max value for each skill; stat increases are not treated as Bonus effects).

levels.name: Speedtaker 2
levels.effect:
At start of turn, grants Spd【Great Talent】+1 to unit.

After combat, if unit attacked, grants Spd【Great Talent】+2 to unit.

Deals damage = 10% of unit's Spd during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

(This skill grants max of【Great Talent】+10.)

【Great Talent】
Adds value of Great Talent (+X) to specified stats (until end of battle; max value of X is determined by the stat reaching the limit of 99, each stat calculated separately and cannot exceed max value for each skill; stat increases are not treated as Bonus effects).

levels.name: Speedtaker 3
levels.effect:
At start of turn, grants Spd【Great Talent】+1 to unit.

After combat, if unit attacked, grants Spd【Great Talent】+3 to unit.

Deals damage = 15% of unit's Spd during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

(This skill grants max of【Great Talent】+15.)

【Great Talent】
Adds value of Great Talent (+X) to specified stats (until end of battle; max value of X is determined by the stat reaching the limit of 99, each stat calculated separately and cannot exceed max value for each skill; stat increases are not treated as Bonus effects).

levels.name: Speedtaker 4
levels.effect:
At start of turn, grants Spd【Great Talent】+1 to unit.

After combat, if unit attacked, grants Spd【Great Talent】+4 to unit.

Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe, unit deals damage = 20% of unit's Spd (excluding area-of-effect Specials), neutralizes unit's penalties to Spd, and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

(This skill grants max of【Great Talent】+20.)

【Great Talent】
Adds value of Great Talent (+X) to specified stats (until end of battle; max value of X is determined by the stat reaching the limit of 99, each stat calculated separately and cannot exceed max value for each skill; stat increases are not treated as Bonus effects).

levels.name: Spoil Rotten
levels.effect:
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Spd/Res-7 and【Sabotage】on closest foes and any foe within 2 spaces of those foes through their next actions and grants "reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special 'reduce damage by X%' skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials)" to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks, and neutralizes effects that inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit during combat.

【Sabotage】
Inflicts penalty on unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest penalty on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit through its next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

levels.name: Spurn 1
levels.effect: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit's HP ≤ 25% and unit's attack can trigger their Special, deals +5 damage when Special triggers.

levels.name: Spurn 2
levels.effect: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit's attack can trigger their Special, deals +5 damage when Special triggers.

levels.name: Spurn 3
levels.effect: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's attack can trigger their Special, deals +5 damage when Special triggers.

levels.name: Spurn 4
levels.effect: Inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foe during combat. If a skill compares unit's Spd to foe or ally's Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +7. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 5 (max 50%). If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, deals +5 damage when Special triggers. If foe's attack triggers unit's Special, unit's next attack deals +5 damage (resets at end of combat).
